Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: peter m. neal
Reviews.Content: Ive had mine for a couple of months now it it works fantastic the sound quality pretty good for the size of the tv but what really sets this apart from my 47" tv is its bright colors and its keeping pace with my Xbox 360 in my room!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: George Eastmond
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Samsung Television set for my spare Bedroom. It will be used by the Grandchildren when they sleep over. I currently have two other Television sets in the house and they are both Samsungs. As far as I am concerned there is no better Television set on the market.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung T22B350ND 21.5" 1080p LED-LCD TV - 16:9 - HDTV 1080p - TAA
